Html:
I have started a project in php using symfony framework & also I am using sfPhpExcelPlugin for saving mysql resultset to test.xls file.

But I am getting an error as below when executing php web application:

Fatal error: Class 'XMLWriter' not found in ....plugins/sfPhpExcelPlugin/lib/PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Shared/XMLWriter.php on line 66

Version Details:

1. PHP - v5.3.6

2. Symfony - v1.3.11

3. sfPhpExcelPlugin - v1.0.3

What would be the cause of the Fatal error occurring?

Please help me out....
